column4: dude, he doesn't know the answer, and quite frankly who would?  just let it go.
I don't know, that's why I asked. I don't need some trivial back and forth though. It's unhelpful and unproductive.
You're being a jerk is what you're doing. I've done more than enough support work myself to know that.
If you're like this guy you're about as helpful as a doctor that smacks you when you talk.
